body.p: Granted these are from the time of different screen sizes and at least seven years old but I worked with what I had at a public university to create instructions for graduate students to aid in the formatting and submission of electronic theses and dissertations (ETD). These videos were produced with Camtasia screen capture software.
This video assists students who may not be familiar with Microsoft Word with how to generate a table of contents automatically.
This next video assists students with inserting special characters for equations.
